summary: Star Rating module testing complete. All features working correctly including Employees tab with stars count, Teams tab with proper table structure (no inline expanded rows), 'View members' opening Team Details view, Add Stars form with all 4 types (Performance/Learning/Innovation/Unsafe), star history API, and BluBridge theme colors applied to Reports page.

minor.issue: Requires from_date and to_date parameters (422 without them) - this is expected behavior for reports

issues: Minor React warning: A component is changing a controlled input to be uncontrolled - likely in date picker fields

star_rating_employees_tab.description: Employees tab shows table with Name, Email, Team, Stars, Unsafe, Actions columns

star_rating_teams_tab.description: Teams tab shows proper table structure with Team, Members, Team Stars, Avg, Actions columns
verified_elements: 'View members' button opens separate Team Details view
Member cards show in Team Details

star_rating_add_form.description: Add/Edit form displays correctly with weekly data entry

star_rating_logic.description: Stars awarded by Admin reflect correctly in employee's total
star_rating_logic.verified: Vijayan K has 8 stars (5 performance + 3 learning as per history)

star_rating_history.verified: History shows all star awards with type, reason, stars count, month

month_filter.description: Month picker displays correctly using input type='month'
month_filter.verified: Shows 2026-02 format, Apply button filters by month

reports_theme_colors.verified: #0b1f3b for Leave Report tab and Export button, #fffdf7 container background, #efede5 page background

vijayan_k_verification.status: VERIFIED - Stars correctly reflected in employee view

critical_code_review_comments: Minor: React controlled/uncontrolled input warning in Add Stars form - not blocking functionality

success_rate.backend: 85% (11/13 tests pass - 2 failures due to required date params on reports endpoints)
success_rate.frontend: 100% - All Star Rating and Reports features working correctly

seed_data_creation: None - used existing data, added test stars to employees during API testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Star Rating module fully functional. Employees tab shows employees with stars count in table view. Teams tab shows teams in table format with 'View members' button that opens a separate Team Details view showing member cards (no inline expanded rows). Add Stars form supports Performance/Learning (weekly) and Innovation/Unsafe (simple) types. Vijayan K verified to have 8 stars. BluBridge theme (#0b1f3b, #fffdf7, #efede5) applied correctly to Reports page buttons and containers.
